InteractionAttendee.name: InteractionAttendee
InteractionAttendee.description: Represents an attendee of an interaction.

AttendeeResponse.description: Specifies the response of the attendee to the interaction.

ContactId.description: The contact who attended the interaction.

EmailAddress.description: The email address of the attendee.

EventId.description: The event on Salesforce calendar for this attendee.

InteractionId.description: The interaction for which this attendee record is created.

IsOrganizer.description: Indicates whether the attendee is the interaction organizer.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastSyncedDateTime.description: The date and time when a sync was performed to create or update an interaction from an email client or other solutions in Salesforce.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the interaction attendee.

UserId.description: The user who attended the interaction.
